amendment.description: To address restrictions on the sharing of medical information among affiliates, and for other purposes.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2061 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2061 proposed by Senator Feinstein. (consideration: CR S13878-13879; text: CR S13878) To address restrictions on the sharing of medical information among affiliates, and for other purposes.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2061 proposed by Senator Feinstein.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2061 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
